name: Kombi The Brave Adult Socks - Unisex
description: Chasing first turns or setting fresh tracks? These socks are designed to reduce bulk inside ski boots and provide cushion where it counts. Mesh ventilation zones allow them to breathe.Ski boot adapted cushioning on feet and shins for all day comfort.Mesh ventilation for maximum breathability and dryness.Movement support on arch and ankle allows the sock to move with you.
